page.title: 10Bell Street-Sawbridgeworth
page.content: {Bell Street}is the main shopping area in Sawbridgeworth. It is a one way street and where it meets London Road there used to be an inn and some small shops. These have been knocked down and new buildings put up. There is a new supermarket, Budgens, and an enclosed shopping arcade with pleasant shops. On a rainy day you can shop there without getting wet. At the other end of Bell Street another similar complex has been built. There is a lot of competition between various shops. They do not clash with the older type shops but fit in quite pleasantly and make a useful addition to the shops of Sawbridgeworth. It is a pleasant place to meet people and you can see groups of friends quietly talking as they meet one another unexpectedly.
